import React, { useState } from 'react'; const Contact = () => { const [message, setMessage] = useState(''); const handleSubmit = (e) => { e.preventDefault(); const mailtoLink = "mailto:solgoodwill@gmail.com?subject=Contact%20Us%20Message&body=" + encodeURIComponent(message); window.location.href = mailtoLink; }; return (

Contact Us

+251 925 546 800
solgoodwill@gmail.com
kazanchis SA Building Office # 11-03
Addis Ababa, Ethiopia
); }; export default Contact;
